fields.title: evaluating multiple integrals: change of variables
fields.pointers:
* Some particular examples of this trick:
**  [polar coordinates](eval_multi_int_polar_coordinates)
**  [spherical coordinates](eval_multi_int_spherical_coordinates)
**  [cylindrical coordinates](eval_multi_int_cylindrical_coordinates)
* We use the same change of variables formula to determine the  [PDF of a function of a continuous random variable](function_of_random_variable_tricks) .
fields.summary: A useful trick for computing multiple integrals is to find a simpler parameterization of the region and apply the change of variables formula.
